profile_data.summary: Passionate to work on interesting ideas and solve real-world problems using my eight years of expertise in deep learning, computer vision, robotics and generative AI. I absolutely love training neural networks, problem-solving and am well versed in leading ML projects and writing code in several programming languages.
profile_data.headline: Machine Learning Researcher/Engineer

experience.description: Worked at Intelligent Systems and Assistive Technologies Lab (ISAT) under the supervision of Dr. Juan Wachs on three main projects: 1. Developing a real-time gesture recognition system for the Operating Room, 2. Devising transfer learning approaches to attain knowledge transfer between multiple robots and 3. Developing Few-Shot learning algorithms to recognize objects from one or a few examples.
experience.title: Research Assistant

experience.description: Worked with adaptive interactions team at Facebook Reality Labs on on developing generalizable intent to interact prediction models for virtual/augmented reality applications using physiological data.
experience.title: Machine Learning Scientist Intern

experience.description: Worked at Mechatronics and Robotics Laboratory under the supervision of Dr. S. K. Dwivedy on projects related to humanoid robotics, gesture recognition and face recognition.
experience.title: Research Scholar

education.activities: Awarded as all rounder of school in 2010.

An active member of Balavikas (a spiritual school) and took part in sanitation drives, blood donation camps, and social service activities to create social and environmental awareness in the public.

projects.description: Study and analysis of a three phase transformer followed by development of GUI using Matlab for converting data of 3 phase transformer into single phase transformer.  A generic code is developed for any possible combination of Wye and Delta transformers.
projects.title: Analysis and Development of GUI for manipulations of data from different phases of transformer

projects.description: As a research assistant, I am working on developing a gesture recognition system for neurosurgeons to browse Magnetic Resonance Images (MRI) in the operating room. First, we have conducted, human studies to identify typical PACS functions and gesture preferences of surgeons. Next, we have developed a real-time gesture recognition (GR) system to allow neurosurgeons to manipulate MRI/CT images. This GR system utilizes body and hand skeletons obtained from Kinect and convolutional networks respectively. Besides playing a crucial role in system development, academic manuscript writing, I have learned to lead and manage an interdisciplinary team.
projects.title: GestureClean: A real-time gesture recognition system for operating room

projects.description: Proposed an approach for knowledge transfer to utilize the knowledge gained from one robot (and/or simulator) to recognize the atomic surgical procedures performed by other robots that have different anthropometry.
projects.title: Dexterous Surgical Skills Transfer to Medical Robots, Purdue University

projects.description:
Built an autonomous car capable of localization and navigate w.r.t a given map using ROS and AMCL.
Involved automatic control of speed by utilizing LIDAR sensor and predicting several next states of the car.
projects.title: Development of autonomous car

projects.description: Developed a software that integrates the Microsoft Kinect data and NAO robot controller in real time. This complex motion imitation system is used to generate artificial data of cognitive tasks for learning
projects.title: Motion imitation by NAO humanoid using Kinect and inverse kinematics

projects.description: Developed the software for automatic visuo – motor data generation for cognitive tasks like object grasping, manipulation, and obstacle avoidance by iCub humanoid robot to train the deep neural network models. It involved the vision based object tracking, simultaneous motor control and data acquisition
projects.title: Gesture based object manipulation and grasping via deep learning on iCub humanoid

projects.description: Developed a system to enable the Biped robot (NAO) to emulate upper body 3D human motions using color trackers and image processing. It involved the applications of computer vision, direct and inverse kinematics.
projects.title: Dynamic analysis and Dance imitation by NAO humanoid via color tracking and image processing
